timing_notes: Instruction set and timing identical to 6805. The 6805R2 adds on-chip peripherals (UART, timer, I/O ports) but the CPU core and instruction timing are unchanged from the base 6805.

instructions.notes: All 188 instructions identical to 6805 base. See m6805_timing.json for complete instruction listing. 6805R2 adds UART, timer, and I/O peripherals with no CPU core changes.
